titleStmt.title: Tamiḻneṟi Viḷakkam 20.
Experimenting with formatting for the final edition.

body.head: Commentary
body.p: eṉpatu uṭaṉ pōkku valittal ām āṟuṇarttutaṉutaliṟṟu.
The quoted [cūttiram] intends to make known the way in which 'encouraging elopement' occurs.
alar periteṉṟaṉ mutal ākap pāvak kiḷavi yīṟākac collap paṭṭa kiḷavikaḷai yuṭaitteṉṟu colluvar uṭaṉ pōkku valittalai eṉṟa vāṟu.
They say about 'ecouraging elopement' that it possesses those aforementioned speech situations, beginning with 'talking about the gossip being great' and ending with 'the speech of pity'.

div.p: eṉpatu talaimakaḷ uṭaṉ cela nērnta pāvak kiḷavi. 20.
